column2: crazymomof2, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: i took one dose, and the taste just about made me throw up! it is VILE, i dont think i can stomach another dose, id rather put up with not sleeping because of my caugh.

column2: samimg, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I received immediate relief for my coughing, coughing that was deep and hard with lots of phlegm.

column2: Gracie, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was up 2-3 times a night coughing. The first night i took it i had the  best sleep ever..didnt wake up once!!

column2: papa, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I still coughed alot.Couldn't sleep lying down or cough came back

column2: nurse,  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
Veronica RN, 55-64 on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This dies not work well to supres cough in a Bronchitis case.

column2: Laura, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had my dr. call in something for my cough. I knew it would be something that would make me drowsy but I was having coughing fits that were so bad from bronchitis, it hurt my chest & throat. I took one dose so far and have not had a coughing fit.  It hasn't made me drowsy or dizzy. I hope the next dose will let me sleep most of the night.

column2: boxerdana, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Tastes horrible, but overall eased my horrible cough and helped with the chest and sinus congestion. I was able to sleep for 4 hours at a time without coughing.

column2: Not one, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My daughter took this medication for a really bad cough. I found her passed out on the bathroom floor. She is 20 years old and I have no idea what happened.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have asthma and this was not the ideal medicine to have put me on especially since it can interact with my fast acting inhaler.  If you have asthma beware of this drug!

column2: 65-74 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Quieted the cough and helped me sleep so I could get well sooner.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Had a harsh painful cough, medication prescribed every 6 hours and worked very well to ease the pain and cough i was having with bronchitis. Eased congestion in chest

column2: brenda, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: after taking this medication I began having severe musle spasms in my feet and lower legs and abdominal pain.  I did't know what was causing this pain until I noticed that every time I took the medication my pain became more frequent and severe. I also would fall asleep, but slept for only two hours a night and was awake for the remaining hours of the night. I developed fever and terrible dry mouth and the inability cough up mucous.

column2: momof2, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: It makes me cough more. I can't take it during the day because of the codine. It helped with vomiting, but thats it. Ask for something else if you can!

column2: Jana, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have completed my treatment, but am still coughing (bronchitis). So the drug helped, but did not get rid of the cough.
